CustomField.formula: IF($Organization.Id = '00D3H0000000ivA',"https://aspect.co.uk","https://aspect.co.uk.hyv.gotest.it")& "/book-now/?id="&Id& "&acc="& Account__c & "&acn="& Account_Reference__c & "&exc="& "Yes" & "&fn="&SUBSTITUTE( Account__r.First_Name__c , " ", "%20") & "&ln="&SUBSTITUTE( Account__r.Last_Name__c , " ", "%20") & "&ema="& Contact_Email_who_Raised_Job__c & "&pho="& SUBSTITUTE(Account__r.Phone," ","")
CustomField.label: Book Online URL
